extendedInfo.description: Version Free!Piece Strategy Game on Android?That's right, the game hundreds of strategies now in your Android!To play is simple:Begin with a row of game pieces in the upper part and a lower part of the plate. To win this game you must have 3 pieces of the same color in a (not the initial setup) setup diagonal, horizontal or vertical.Restart the game whenever you want by pressing the menu of your device.Economical and lightweight battery for you to ride all sorts of strategies to face his friends.Train reasoning, think fast trained to implement each strategy in play and win!A great app for free time, travel, spend time!Applied training mode and multiplayer together to save energy of your device.Choose Blue or Red and enter that!Despicable Me 2 !(photos review of game complete).
